content.raw:
Currently we have the version dependencies encoded in the following places:

* [dependencies_archive.sh](#!/osrf/release-tools/src/8d01358ba65e99da98b9ec5ac96ce2a00cb32ba0/jenkins-scripts/lib/dependencies_archive.sh?fileviewer=file-view-default) for ubuntu
* [homebrew formulae](https://github.com/osrf/homebrew-simulation/blob/master/ignition-msgs.rb#L18)

A more general way would be to encode these in `package.xml` files and use something like rosdep to resolve them
content.html:
Currently we have the version dependencies encoded in the following places:

  • dependencies_archive.sh for ubuntu
  • homebrew formulae

A more general way would be to encode these in package.xml files and use something like rosdep to resolve them
